name: Medic VS Virus
description:
Welcome to Medic VS Virus

This game was created in 72 hours as part of the Ludum Dare 46.

The theme was Keep it alive

Viruses are coming to attack the hospital's generator, protect it by using your various soldiers in this cartoon-style tower defense.

The boxes are the battlefield, you must select a unit to buy it and choose the box on which you want to place it

At the top left is your life, when a monster crosses the screen you lose damage

Change log

Version 1.0.1 

The difficulty has been increased
